analysis: The project is a static website focused on black holes with existing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. The current theme needs enhancement to fully reflect a cosmic, dark aesthetic with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML structure is incomplete, missing sections like interactive planets and animated slides. The CSS file requires a dark cosmic theme with animations, and the JavaScript needs fixes for syntax errors and functionality improvements.

improvements.description: Add sections for interactive planets, animated slides, and black hole-related content with proper structure and mobile-friendly navigation.
Implement a dark cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, glowing elements, and Egyptian-themed color palette.
Fix syntax errors in the showSlide function, implement mobile menu toggle with smooth transitions, and add event listeners for interactive elements.
